column4: ï»¿ hello everyone, I am unable to use 'cp' with a file name stored in a variable....   first i type:  x="/home/zubair/Pictures/Photos/Chengdu-Street-Shots/Jin Li/2006_06_10/Jin Li -2.tif" and it is followed by cp "$x" -t shots/   ...it says no such file ..
